title: Umami LXC
textContent:
Umami LXC 
                Umami makes it easy to
                    collect,
                    analyze, and understand your web data — while maintaining visitor privacy and data ownership.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Umami LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                    To Update Umami, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/umami.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 12GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Umami Interface: IP:3000
outerHTML:
Umami LXC

Umami makes it easy to collect, analyze, and understand your web data — while maintaining visitor privacy and data ownership.

To create a new Proxmox VE Umami LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Umami, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/umami.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 12GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Umami Interface: IP:3000
